jobs.title: Front-End Developer at Vendoo.ge
responsibilities: Active participation in the planning of the work process for the development of the site
Discussing and actively using the latest technologies in the project, such as Next.js, Tailwind CSS and TypeScript
Maintaining coding standards preserves project quality

jobs.title: Software Quality Assurance Specialist
responsibilities: Calibrated instruments to match required tolerances and achieve consistent, reliable results.
Rejected and detailed non-compliant processes, noting correct configuration based on related drawings, specifications and plans.
Communicated product, process and documentation discrepancies to correct problems and achieve process improvements.
Sampled and tested products based on item type, quality grading requirements and regulatory standards.
Tracked and reported inspection results for raw materials to notify management of substandard input.
Removed defects from material surfaces for more polished finish.
Monitored the proper recycling or disposal of unacceptable products.
Calculated defect percentages or averages to help locate root cause of problems.

jobs.title: Intern frontend developer at Mymarket.ge
responsibilities: Creating basic HTML structures for web pages
Implementing simple CSS styles and layouts
Assisting in converting design mockups to HTML/CSS
Learning and applying responsive design principles
Collaborating with senior developers on small tasks
Participating in code reviews to improve skills
Helping maintain and update existing web pages

jobs.title: Junior Front-End Developer at Myparts.ge
responsibilities: Building responsive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code
Working with modern front-end frameworks like React and Next
Debugging and fixing issues in existing code
Participating in code reviews and incorporating feedback
Assisting in the development of reusable components and libraries
Assisting in the implementation of version control using Git
Participating in agile development processes and team meetings
